<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelManager"></a>

# OpenXRRenderModelManager

**Inherits:** [Node3D](class_node3d.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Helper node that will automatically manage displaying render models.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This helper node will automatically manage displaying render models. It will create new [OpenXRRenderModel](class_openxrrendermodel.md) nodes as controllers and other hand held devices are detected, and remove those nodes when they are deactivated.

\ **Note:** If you want more control over this logic you can alternatively call [OpenXRRenderModelExtension.render_model_get_all()](class_openxrrendermodelextension.md#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_all) to obtain a list of active render model ids and create [OpenXRRenderModel](class_openxrrendermodel.md) instances for each render model id provided.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_OpenXRRenderModelManager_RenderModelTracker"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **RenderModelTracker**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_OpenXRRenderModelManager_RenderModelTracker)

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelManager_constant_RENDER_MODEL_TRACKER_ANY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[RenderModelTracker](class_openxrrendermodelmanager.md#enum_OpenXRRenderModelManager_RenderModelTracker) **RENDER_MODEL_TRACKER_ANY** = `0`

All active render models are shown regardless of what tracker they relate to.<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelManager_constant_RENDER_MODEL_TRACKER_NONE_SET"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[RenderModelTracker](class_openxrrendermodelmanager.md#enum_OpenXRRenderModelManager_RenderModelTracker) **RENDER_MODEL_TRACKER_NONE_SET** = `1`

Only active render models are shown that are not related to any tracker we manage.<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelManager_constant_RENDER_MODEL_TRACKER_LEFT_HAND"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[RenderModelTracker](class_openxrrendermodelmanager.md#enum_OpenXRRenderModelManager_RenderModelTracker) **RENDER_MODEL_TRACKER_LEFT_HAND** = `2`

Only active render models are shown that are related to the left hand tracker.<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelManager_constant_RENDER_MODEL_TRACKER_RIGHT_HAND"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[RenderModelTracker](class_openxrrendermodelmanager.md#enum_OpenXRRenderModelManager_RenderModelTracker) **RENDER_MODEL_TRACKER_RIGHT_HAND** = `3`

Only active render models are shown that are related to the right hand tracker.<hr class="classref-section-separator">

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelManager_property_make_local_to_pose"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](class_string.md) **make_local_to_pose** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelManager_property_make_local_to_pose)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_make_local_to_pose**\ (\ value\: [String](class_string.md)\ )
- [String](class_string.md) **get_make_local_to_pose**\ (\ )

Position render models local to this pose (this will adjust the position of the render models container node).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelManager_property_tracker"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[RenderModelTracker](class_openxrrendermodelmanager.md#enum_OpenXRRenderModelManager_RenderModelTracker) **tracker** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelManager_property_tracker)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_tracker**\ (\ value\: [RenderModelTracker](class_openxrrendermodelmanager.md#enum_OpenXRRenderModelManager_RenderModelTracker)\ )
- [RenderModelTracker](class_openxrrendermodelmanager.md#enum_OpenXRRenderModelManager_RenderModelTracker) **get_tracker**\ (\ )

Limits render models to the specified tracker. Include: 0 = All render models, 1 = Render models not related to a tracker, 2 = Render models related to the left hand tracker, 3 = Render models related to the right hand tracker.
